term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - full energy peak
term.title: full energy peak

item.text: Of a spectrum of radiation, the part of the spectral response curve corresponding to the total absorption in a detecting material of the energy of the detected radiation.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1543 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
